__e: The guy who tried to kill you... it wasn't me.
I really don't want to kill you, Jane, not after everything we've been through.
If I was gonna kill you, do you think there'd be a better place than this?
Then, why would you... I should have killed you when I had the chance.
I should've killed you when I had the chance.
I should've killed you when I could, and now... now I can.
I should've killed you when I could, and now... now I can.
I mean... you told me I had to kill you when you least expected it.
Showed it to me the next day, said it was proof he could kill you any time he wanted unless I did whatever he said.
I was gonna kill you for what you did to Sara, but she stopped me, and I'm glad.
Yeah, I want you to get healthy and strong, so I can kill you for what you did to my apartment.
I should kill you for what you did to my mother.
You have no idea how hard it is for me not to kill you now.
I ought to kill you right now for what you've done to her!
What if I felt like I needed to kill you right now?
He's not gonna kill you. It was just something that he thought.
So you said that your wife wanted to murder you, And now you don't know why?
I tell you someone's planning to have you killed and all you say is OK?
Okay, I wanted to kill you, but now I see that's not such a good idea.
Look, I'm not I'm not saying... they're the same, I've thought about having sex with you... and God, I've never seriously thought of killing you, but...
